title: Simplify Linux and Docker Command Lines with Bash Completion
author: Jack Wallen
description: By way of the Tab key, Bash Completion can autocomplete your thorniest Linux and Docker commands. Here's how to set it up.
cntitle: 使用 Bash 补全简化 Linux 和 Docker 命令行
cndescription: 通过 Tab 键，Bash 补全可以自动补全您最棘手的 Linux 和 Docker 命令。以下是设置方法。
